risks.description: Post-message overhead might exceed processing savings if not carefully implemented.
risks.mitigation_strategy: Use SharedArrayBuffer or transferable objects for audio data.

risks.description: Refactoring the entire pipeline to async worker communication could break the 60Hz feedback loop.
risks.mitigation_strategy: Implement a fallback to main thread processing.

growth_blockers.blocker: Lack of SharedArrayBuffer support in some browsers

growth_enablers.impact: Enables much more complex analysis without jank.

risks.description: Rendering complex SVG heatmaps might slow down the dashboard.
